{{wikipedia|Aisin Gioro}}

===Etymology===
A transcription into Chinese characters of {{etyl|mnc|zh}} {{m|mnc|ᠠᡳᠰᡳᠨ ᡤᡳᠣᡵᠣ|tr=Aisin Gioro}}, the "[[gold]]" [[family]] (''Aisin'') of the [[Yilan]] (''Gioro'') [[clan]] of the [[Jianzhou]] [[Jurchen]]s.
